Html:
Hi there,
I found that a named range interval makes php/phpExcel crash.
It causes an apache child process to crash (segmentation fault) so the http connection will be reset.
Example of a Named Range Interval:
='InputParameters'!$E$35:$E$45


Happy Monday.

bitsurs

I still have this problem while trying to write to an Excel2003 file. From Apache log:

[Tue May 17 17:05:10 2011] [notice] Parent: child process exited with status 3221225477 -- Restarting.
